name: PolyTears Pre-Alpha Testing v0.1
description:
PolyTears is an in-dev, low poly far cry-inspired game with an open world and many things to do in it, such as liberate enemy outposts, explore and hunt! 

 Join my discord for more updates on this game! https://discord.gg/SmgVbmX

--Controls--

1-4 - Select Weapon

F - Use melee

H - Heal

WASD - Movement

Shift - Sprint

Space - Jump

LeftMouse - Shoot/Attack

RightMouse - ADS

R - Reload
